subject: Re: Rumbie's website changes
preview: Perfect!  Thank you!   Rumbie & Co Sydney's Curly Hair Experts 02 9318 0698 Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008 www.rumbie.co

full_threads.body:
Perfect!

Thank you!


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Rumbie, 

Ok can you please see if you like it now? Thanks,

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much for all the changes. It looks great now!

We are still not happy with the colour of the price list, can we please go back to the same colour of the background? If we have the lettering in black and the lines in between the sections in black as well I don't think we need a different colour.

Thank you!


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Rumbie, 

Confirming the below updates have now also been made.

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much.

There are still some things I asked that didn't suffer any change, can you please help me with the following items?

1.Home page: Take out button `call us on...` located at the `straight` section

2.About page: Take out the whole section `What to expect`

3.Price List page: `Colours Services` still written at the top of the page, please take it out

4.Change ''The experience' sayings to:
We understand how life can be hectic so when you come into our salon you can take a break and expect out team to make you feel at home.

You'll be offered a relaxing Visarôme massage as a part of our welcoming ritual using a choice of diluted essential oils for you to relax, so sit back and enjoy the ambience and the connections.

Rumbie & Co hair stylists place great emphasis on comprehensive consultations, understanding your needs and working with you to deliver a perfect synergy for all clients in a creative, relaxed and safe atmosphere.

5. Create another section after `The experience` called `How to prepare to my appointment` with these sayings:

Hair should be washed, detangled and dry before the appointment because curl is distorted when hair is wet. An extra charge may be incurred for detangling and rescheduling in other cases.

If there's any hair extensions, cornrows or plaits, please take them out prior to the appointment or can also book to hair extension removal before the desired service.



6.Change back the colour of the tabs to that green, we don`t want it black and we want to be able to open AND close the tabs, so arrow needs to work both ways when we click on it.

7.Change our policy sayings to:
Our pricing is a reflection of our commitment, continual training, education and experience. The prices may be subject to change without prior notification.
Please be aware that during your booking a 50% deposit is required to secure all appointments. Deposit may be taken over the phone and no card details will be recorded. Once the deposit has been processed, the receipt will be emailed to your provided email address.

A confirmation text will be sent 48 hours before appointment to allow ample time for adjustments. The popularity of our team requires 24-hour notice when cancelling or rescheduling an appointment. Failure to notify Rumbie & Co in time will incur in a charge of 50% of the total price of services booked or a loss of deposit. Late arrivals to an appointment without any notification will be considered a no show.



Thank you so much once again,

Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Bruna, 

Ok sure, now we can see the problem and have fixed it up: https://rumbie.co/price-list/

Hi Heath,

Good. Thanks.

What I meant was that we are missing the content for Afro Specialty, the content that shows is related to Hair Extensions. Same thing is happening with sections: Keratin Smoothing, Treatments and Hair Extensions.


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Bruna, 

Please check now and if the price list looks out of place, clear your browsers cache.

Hi Heath,

It's better now, but the word TRUE is still there between "Our values are" and the values. Can you take it out?

Can we also please fix the price list asap? Something happened and it's everything out of place.

Can you please change the menu bar back to how it was? I'm sorry about this, Rumbie didn't like it.

Thank you!


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Bruna, 

Ok sure, confirming we have sorted this out now: https://rumbie.co/about/

Hi Heath,

I'm sorry I forgot to mention that the values the way they are, are not forming the word TRUE. It needs to be exactly in this order:


Togetherness: A community that excludes even one member is no community at all.
Respect: Is just a minimum.
Upliftment: We rise by lifting others.
Empowerment: Not competing. Period.

Can you please also change the word Empowering to Empowerment?

Thank you once again.

Bruna


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Heath,

Happy Friday!

Thank you for the changes.

On the price list we want to be able to open and close the tabs, is that possible?
And can you please keep the colour that was before?
On top of the "Price List" there's a sentence that shouldn't be there "Colours services" can you please take it out?
On the "straight" section, can you please take that button "please call us on..."?
Can you also take out the word "TRUE" that is above the values?

Thank you so much!

Bruna


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Rumbie, 

Happy Friday! 

Confirming we have updated the nav bar, price list/accordions and straight image/section on the home page. 

Also, here is a quick how to video for when you want to update the pricing table https://www.useloom.com/share/1cd9fd7869294e12b8e8f63fe3a8d162

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Thank you for the information. I'm sorry for the confusion.
No worries. You can go ahead with the changes.

Can I add some other changes?

Please move our values so we have the word TRUE like:

Togetherness: A community that excludes even one member is no community at all.
Respect: Is just a minimum.
Upliftment: We rise by lifting others.
Empowerment: Not competing. Period.

Can you also make the picture on the 'straight' section expand like the pictures in the other sections? It's really different. And take the 'share image' button that appears when you put the mouse on top of it.


Can you please show me how to change the content of the price list? I couldn't find the prices and descriptions.

Thank you!

Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Bruna, 

Thanks for getting back to me. You guys are on our Lite Plan, which has no included hours per month. In fact, we actually gave you guys almost a 75% discount, so unfortunately there is zero wiggle room on that. And yes, any changes would need to be paid for.

You can access the backend, I have just sent the login instructions and here is a quick how to video: https://www.useloom.com/share/3c387836488347b986526d4a95eb320d

Hi Heath,

Rumbie informed me that apparently we had 2 hours of support per month from you. I didn't know we had to pay to have small things edited on the website.
Do we pay to have the blog posts uploaded as well? If we do, is it possible for us to have access to the back end and could you also advise how we can make the changes by ourselves?

Thank you.


Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co

Hi Bruna, 

Sure, we can make these changes, no problems. It's a 30min task @ $99/hr. 

Please advise if we are ok to continue? We will be able to squeeze it in this afternoon.

Hi team,

Hope you are well.

Heath redirected me to you so you can give me support with Rumbie's website.
I absolutely love it, so congratulations on the hard work.

I was thinking we could make some little changes to make the website even better and easier:

1. Can we have the menu bar showing as soon as we enter the website?
2. Can we have tabs that open up for each one of the items (Consultation, Style, Cuts, Colour, Keratin, Treatments, Hair extensions, Afro) on the price list and delete the bar that shows the items on the top? If we have the tabs we could have little arrows to click and this would make the tabs open up so people could see the prices for each section.

Please me let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you!

Rumbie & Co
Sydney's Curly Hair Experts
02 9318 0698
Unit 14/128 Cleveland Street Chippendale 2008
www.rumbie.co
